statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accounts FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%John%' AND account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY id HAVING transaction_count > 2;
SELECT username, amount FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_history ON user_accounts.id = transaction_history.user_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM User_Accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, amount, date FROM Transaction_History WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT username, notifications FROM User_Settings WHERE notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM User_Accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM User_Accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM User_Accounts u JOIN Transaction_History t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Transaction_History WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.notifications FROM User_Accounts u JOIN User_Settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts
SELECT user_id, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT u.full_name, u.address, t.amount FROM user_profiles u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, max(balance) AS max_balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 0 GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_type, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 2;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_type, balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id;

SELECT u.username, a.account_type, t.transaction_type, th.description FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id GROUP BY u.username;
